name: Offroad Driving Simulator 4x4
description:
Go on an extreme off road adventure - drive through hills and ravines, deserts and forests, mud and snow! Experience off road driving as it is, with total control of your car, and become a champion of complete an epic trophy raid!

  •  🗺️> An epic offroad trip across MULTIPLE REGIONS  
  • 🚘 DOZENS of various TRUCKS and SUVs
  •   🛠️ Lots of UPGRADES and customusazion
  •   ⚙️ WINCH, DIFF LOCK and other off road driving mechanisms  
  • 🏆 Special MISSIONS and CHALLENGES for rewards

Take part in off road driving contest and prove that your are the best at driving across multiple regions with different conditions and trials on trucks of three various types. Prepare your self for a lot of extreme challenge - start your engine and go offroad!  

Get behind the wheel of all sorts of offroad vehicles of various types and classes, from a regular 4x4 SUV to gigantic monster-truck. Each is equipped with special off road driving devices, like a winch, and can be visibly upgraded for better performance. Use all you have to get and edge in driving! 

Face various trials of the extreme offroad - cross rivers and snowy forests, climb up hills and crawl over rocks. And complete various additional challenges and missions to get extra rewards. Make your own way to the title of the champion!
